Class CherrySeed

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • CherrySeed
  • public class CherrySeed
extends greenfoot.Actor
    Cherry seeds are pooped out by herbivores and will sprout into cherries at the start of each new day.
    Version:
    April 27, 2022
    Author:
    Max and Nathan

    • Constructor Detail

      • CherrySeed

        public CherrySeed​(int totalActs)
        Constructor for cherry seed. Creates a cherry with a set image and uses parameter to set the time it takes to sprout

    • Method Detail

      • act

        public void act()
        CherrySeed will remove itself after two seconds after spawning and drop one cherry in place of it. The CherrySeed will only spawn the seed when it is night time.
        Overrides:
        act in class greenfoot.Actor

      • toggleCanSprout

        public static void toggleCanSprout​(boolean x)
        Method that changes whether the cherry is allowed to sprout or not
